committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to expand the boundary of the Weir Farm National Historic Site in the State of Connecticut.
short_title: Weir Farm National Historic Site Expansion Act of 1994

summary.text: Weir Farm National Historic Site Expansion Act of 1994 - Amends the Weir Farm National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1990 to expand the boundary of the Weir Farm National Historic Site in Connecticut to include specified lands.

titles.title: Weir Farm National Historic Site Expansion Act of 1994
Weir Farm National Historic Site Expansion Act of 1994
A bill to expand the boundary of the Weir Farm National Historic Site in the State of Connecticut.
